title: XeonPWM
description:
XEON PWM is an application which I developed to control my server fans using my homemade controller.

The frontend part is written using React + NextUI. The app mainly uses SignalR to communicate with the backend.

The backend part uses the ASP.NET Core framework. Settings and users are stored in a SQLite database using the EF Core framework. SignalR (websockets) are used to update temperatures etc.

title: HarpoS7
description:
HarpoS7 is a C# library for authenticating sessions in the S7 Comm Plus protocol.
  • It was developed with low memory allocation in mind
  • Fully managed
  • Supports challenge-based authentication (pre-V17 TIA portal)
  • Supports TLS authentication (post-V17 TIA portal)
  • Supports password authorization
  • Tested on real devices

title: ArchTranslator
description:
ArchTranslator is a set of useful tools for ArchWiki translators, written in TypeScript.
  • Copies and pastes the original source
  • Inserts the localized {{TranslationStatus}} template
  • Inserts the English interlanguage link
  • Sorts the header elements according to the ArchWiki style
  • Scans the page content for already translated articles
